Definition: Reasonable Efforts to Obtain Federal Records
Reasonable efforts
to obtain relevant Federal records means VA must continue attempts to obtain the records until
records are obtained, or
it is reasonably certain that
the records do not exist, or
further efforts by VA to obtain the records would be futile.
